Text: Downloaded in less than 5 minutes for me. Awesome torrent dude! Words can't even express how much I appreciate this!
Much appreciated JTrouble! Good luck to the boys and F*CK Victory Records!
Major respect to you for posting this man, and good luck to the whole band! STREETLIGHT!!

I just got a message from the RISC store that Victory records is refusing to deliver copies of the album to the band as originally agreed. If you preordered it and haven't received it yet, hang in there -- it should be arriving as soon as they resolve it. Until then, download and enjoy!

DOWN WITH VICTORY RECORDS and LONG LIVE STREETLIGHT!
Thanks for the upload JTrouble! Good Luck Streetlight! Down with Victory Records!
